snippet.title: Atum Trailer
snippet.description:
"There is no single universe and all of them are one.
Now begins the fun. You're here. You're there.
You're everywhere that there can be another you."

Atum is a game for PC that pulls the player into a world where the player is the mechanic. It brings the point-and-click gameplay of previous generations and combines it with platformer puzzles.

"You Are Here, reads the legend on that map. Which one is you? 
Does it matter? Your finger is a pointer on a screen."

Currently being developed at NHTV IGAD in Breda, The Netherlands as part of the University's Gamelab. The game is specifically being developed for participation in the IGF (Independent Games Festival) and plays with the concept of multi-layer gameplay. The project will run until quarter 4 of 2012.

"The paths not taken in the garden whose forking ways are paved in your imagination."

—Gene Van Troyer

For further details contact:
Thomas Buijtenweg thomaspbuijtenweg@gmail.com
Marta Clavero marta@sassybot.com
